module.title: ‘textonyms’
module.p: ‘Textonyms’ are names identifying scholarly and literary texts and other creative works.
Like other kinds of name, textonyms can be classified into two distinct grammatical types –

ul.li: textonymic proper nouns eg. Gairm [name of quarterly periodical], Bannan [name of television drama serial]
textonymic name-descriptions eg. An Seann-Tiomnadh The Old Testament, Òran na Cloiche [song title]
